API¶

This document contains automatically generated api docs.

Class reference¶

agent.py¶

class misc.agent.Sense(agent)¶

Sense part of sense - think - act loop. Provides an interface to sensors.

class misc.agent.Think(agent)¶

Think part of sense - think - act loop. Computes sensor output, controls robot behaviour. Adds actions to command queue.

class misc.agent.Act(agent)¶

Act part of sense - think - act loop. Runs elements in command queue.

commandqueue.py¶

class misc.commandqueue.QueueElement(fn, comment='')¶

wrapper to put a function plus optional comment in Queue

class misc.commandqueue.CommandQueue(agent)¶

Command queue. saves a list of QueueElement and executes the first function in the Queue (fifo) in a thread. Only one can run at a time. Once it’s finished, the next one starts running.

add_element(func, comment='')¶

Add a function to end of Queue

Args:
func: a function that only takes agent as an argument comment (optional): comment that describes what this element does. Helps understanding what is happening if you print the queue.
clear_queue()¶

Empties the Queue. Currently running elements keep running.

print_queue(max_q=100)¶

Prints the Queue in a human readable fashion.

Args:
max_q (int, optional): maximum number of elements to print. cut off if more.
set_lock()¶

Prevent elements from being added to queue.

tick()¶

Checks if next element in queue needs to run.

unset_lock()¶

Allows elements to be added to queue.

commands.py¶

misc.commands.init_scan(agent)¶

Turn head fully to the right to start the scan.

misc.commands.scan_view_step(agent)¶

move the head a bit to the left and take an image. if head already fully to the left, take an image and finish the scan.

misc.commands.scan_front(agent)¶

takes an image while looking straigt forward. if this is the second attempt, change the camera, then take the image. if this is the third, abort.

misc.commands.look_straight(agent)¶

makes the robot look straigt forward.

misc.commands.pose_ready(agent)¶

if the robot is sitting down, stand up. give audio feedback.

misc.commands.go_to(distance, angle)¶

make the robot turn by a specific angle and walk a specific distance.

Args:
distance (float): distance in meter. angle (float): angle in radians.

recognizer.py¶

class misc.recognizer.Recognizer(model_file='/home/henryk/git/nao-project/res/jarvis.umdl', keywords=['red', 'yellow', 'blue'], terminate=True)¶

Recognizer for phrases and keywords

Utilize snowboy’s hotword detection for detecting a hotword. Snowboy is a deep neural networkbased hotword and wake word detection toolkit. It simply analyzes the recording and compares it using pretrained models. On match it calls a previously saved callback.

Afterwards the phrase is recorded and evaluated using Google Speech Recognition. Unfortunately there are not any details about its implementation.

For using the Recognizer class create an instance of the class passing a path to the model_file for hotword detection and a list of keywords. If nothing is provided it will take the Jarvis Model and red, yellow, and blue as default values. You may set terminate to True for enabling termination after any keywords are recognized in a recorded phrase.

Finally call run.

recognizer = Recognizer() recognizer.run()

You may override methods like on_hotword, on_phrase and on_keyword by subclassing Recognizer or monkey patching them. That way you are able to control and intervene into the recognizing process perfectly.

A working internet connection is mandatory for using the class since Google Speech Recognition requires it. Snowboy works offline.

If you want to try out the class call python recognizer.py in your shell.

For more information about Snowboy visit https://snowboy.kitt.ai/.

get_keyword_history()¶

Returns the keyword history

Returns:
List of keywords that were detected
get_keywords()¶

Returns keywords

Returns:
List of keywords
get_terminate()¶

Returns termination setting

Returns:
True of termination is enabled
load_hotword_model(model_file)¶

Loads a new hotword model file into the detector

Args:
model_file: Path to a .umdl file used for hotword detection
load_recognizer(adjust_microphone=True)¶

Loads the recognizer

Args:
adjust_microphone: True for adjusting the recognizer using the default microphone
on_hotword()¶

Callback which gets called whenever the hotword was detected

on_interrupt_check()¶

Returns True if termination is enabled and detection should be interrupted

Returns:
True if termination is enabled and detection should be interrupted
on_keyword(keyword)¶

Callback which gets called whenever a keywords was detected

Args:
keyword: Keyword that was detected
on_phrase(phrase)¶

Callback which gets called whenever a phrase was recorded

Args:
phrase: Phrase that was recorded
set_keywords(keywords)¶

Sets keywords and transforms each keyword to lower

Args:
keywords: List of keywords
set_terminate(terminate)¶

Sets the termination setting

Args:
terminate: True if termination is enabled

robot.py¶

class misc.robot.Robot(agent)¶

hardware abstraction.

get_head_angle()¶

returns current head orientation.

get_img()¶

takes an image with camera id in agent.think.camera

Returns:
image: image data (numpy matrix)
go_to(distance, angle)¶

first makes Nao turn in specific direction, then waits to stabilize and walks set distance forward.

initPose()¶

puts Nao into a pose where he’s able to walk.

initProxy()¶

handles connection to Nao AL proxies.

move(x, y, theta)¶

makes nao walk and turn with set speed. currently not used.

rest()¶

puts Nao into resting position.

say(s)¶

say phrase

Args:
s (string): thing to say.
set_head_angles(angles)¶

moves head in specific direction.

wake()¶

sets actuator stiffness.

states.py¶

class misc.states.StateMachine(agent)¶

governs which state the robot is in. wait, search, done

change_state(state)¶

change current state to different state

tick()¶

run current state

misc.states.state_wait_fn(agent)¶

defines logic for state ‘wait’

misc.states.state_done_fn(agent)¶

defines logic for state ‘done’

misc.states.state_search_fn(agent)¶

defines logic for state ‘search’
